subtitle: 200 Professional AI Prompts for Students, Creators & Professionals

categories.name: Students & Educators
categories.description: Master your studies and teaching with these educational prompts

prompts.title: Essay Structure Analyzer
prompts.prompt: Analyze this essay topic: [TOPIC]. Provide: 1) Three unique thesis statements, 2) Five main arguments with supporting evidence suggestions, 3) Counter-arguments to address, 4) A recommended structure with paragraph breakdown, 5) Key sources to research.

prompts.title: Complex Concept Explainer
prompts.prompt: Explain [CONCEPT] as if teaching to: 1) A 10-year-old, 2) A college student, 3) An expert. Include real-world examples, common misconceptions, and memory techniques for each level.

prompts.title: Study Schedule Optimizer
prompts.prompt: I have [NUMBER] days until my exam on [SUBJECT]. I study best [MORNING/AFTERNOON/EVENING]. Create a detailed study schedule with: topic breakdown, active recall sessions, practice test timings, and rest periods.

prompts.title: Research Paper Outliner
prompts.prompt: For a research paper on [TOPIC] with [WORD COUNT] words: Generate 1) Research questions, 2) Methodology suggestions, 3) Literature review structure, 4) Data analysis approach, 5) Discussion points template.

prompts.title: Lecture Notes Summarizer
prompts.prompt: Transform these lecture notes into: 1) Key concepts list with definitions, 2) Visual diagram suggestions, 3) Flashcard pairs (Q&A), 4) Practice questions, 5) Real-world applications. Notes: [PASTE NOTES]

prompts.title: Assignment Feedback Analyzer
prompts.prompt: Review this assignment feedback: [FEEDBACK]. Provide: 1) Main improvement areas, 2) Action steps for each point, 3) Resources to address weaknesses, 4) A rewrite strategy, 5) Questions to ask the instructor.

prompts.title: Thesis Statement Generator
prompts.prompt: Topic: [TOPIC]. Generate 5 strong thesis statements that are: argumentative, specific, debatable, and clearly structured. For each, include the main supporting arguments.

prompts.title: Citation Format Helper
prompts.prompt: Convert this source into citations: [SOURCE DETAILS]. Provide formatted citations in: APA 7th, MLA 9th, Chicago 17th, and Harvard styles. Include both in-text and bibliography formats.

prompts.title: Group Project Coordinator
prompts.prompt: Group project: [DESCRIPTION]. Team size: [NUMBER]. Timeline: [DURATION]. Create: 1) Role assignments with responsibilities, 2) Milestone schedule, 3) Communication protocol, 4) Conflict resolution guidelines, 5) Quality checkpoints.

prompts.title: Exam Question Predictor
prompts.prompt: Based on this syllabus [PASTE SYLLABUS] and these past topics [TOPICS], predict 10 likely exam questions with: difficulty level, topic coverage, and suggested answer approaches.

prompts.title: Literature Analysis Framework
prompts.prompt: Analyze [BOOK/POEM/PLAY] focusing on: 1) Theme identification with textual evidence, 2) Character development arcs, 3) Literary devices and their effects, 4) Historical context impact, 5) Critical interpretation perspectives.

prompts.title: Math Problem Solver
prompts.prompt: Problem: [MATH PROBLEM]. Provide: 1) Step-by-step solution with explanations, 2) Alternative solving methods, 3) Common mistakes to avoid, 4) Related practice problems, 5) Real-world application.

prompts.title: Language Learning Planner
prompts.prompt: Learning [LANGUAGE] for [PURPOSE]. Current level: [LEVEL]. Create a 90-day plan with: daily activities, resources, milestones, cultural immersion ideas, and progress tracking methods.

prompts.title: Science Lab Report Writer
prompts.prompt: Experiment: [TITLE]. Data: [RESULTS]. Create a complete lab report with: Introduction, Methodology, Results (with graph suggestions), Discussion, Conclusion, and Error analysis.

prompts.title: Presentation Content Organizer
prompts.prompt: Presentation topic: [TOPIC]. Duration: [MINUTES]. Audience: [AUDIENCE]. Structure the content with: Opening hook, main points with timing, visual suggestions, transitions, and memorable conclusion.

prompts.title: Critical Thinking Enhancer
prompts.prompt: Argument: [STATEMENT]. Analyze using: 1) Logical structure examination, 2) Evidence quality assessment, 3) Hidden assumptions identification, 4) Counter-arguments, 5) Strength/weakness evaluation.

prompts.title: Reading Comprehension Booster
prompts.prompt: Text: [PASSAGE]. Generate: 1) Main idea summary, 2) Supporting details extraction, 3) Inference questions with answers, 4) Vocabulary in context, 5) Author's purpose analysis.

prompts.title: Time Management for Students
prompts.prompt: My commitments: [LIST CLASSES, ACTIVITIES]. Goals: [GOALS]. Create a weekly schedule with: study blocks, assignment deadlines, self-care time, and flexibility buffers.

prompts.title: Scholarship Essay Writer
prompts.prompt: Scholarship: [NAME]. Prompt: [QUESTION]. My story: [BRIEF BACKGROUND]. Create an essay outline with: compelling opening, unique angle, specific achievements, future vision, and strong closing.

prompts.title: Debate Argument Builder
prompts.prompt: Motion: [DEBATE TOPIC]. Side: [FOR/AGAINST]. Generate: 1) Three main arguments with evidence, 2) Rebuttals to opposing points, 3) Opening statement, 4) Closing statement, 5) Q&A preparation.

prompts.title: Online Course Note-taker
prompts.prompt: Online course: [COURSE NAME]. Module: [TOPIC]. Convert video content into: 1) Structured notes with timestamps, 2) Key takeaways, 3) Action items, 4) Additional research topics, 5) Quiz questions.

prompts.title: College Application Essay Coach
prompts.prompt: Essay prompt: [PROMPT]. My experiences: [BRIEF LIST]. Generate: 1) Three unique story angles, 2) Outline for each angle, 3) Vivid detail suggestions, 4) Reflection points, 5) Authenticity checks.

prompts.title: Procrastination Breaker
prompts.prompt: Task I'm avoiding: [TASK]. Why I'm avoiding it: [REASON]. Create: 1) 5-minute starting ritual, 2) Task breakdown into tiny steps, 3) Reward system, 4) Accountability method, 5) Completion celebration plan.

prompts.title: Study Group Facilitator
prompts.prompt: Subject: [SUBJECT]. Study group size: [NUMBER]. Create: 1) Effective discussion questions, 2) Teaching rotation schedule, 3) Practice activities, 4) Progress tracking method, 5) Group norms.

prompts.title: Historical Event Analyzer
prompts.prompt: Event: [HISTORICAL EVENT]. Analyze: 1) Causes (short and long-term), 2) Key figures and their roles, 3) Timeline of developments, 4) Immediate and lasting impacts, 5) Historical debate points.

prompts.title: Concept Map Creator
prompts.prompt: Central concept: [CONCEPT]. Generate a concept map structure with: 1) Main concept breakdown, 2) Relationships between ideas, 3) Examples for each branch, 4) Cross-connections, 5) Visual organization suggestions.

prompts.title: Lesson Plan Designer
prompts.prompt: Subject: [SUBJECT]. Grade: [LEVEL]. Topic: [TOPIC]. Duration: [TIME]. Create a lesson plan with: Learning objectives, engaging opening, main activities, assessment methods, differentiation strategies, and closure.

prompts.title: Assignment Prioritizer
prompts.prompt: My assignments: [LIST WITH DUE DATES]. Consider: importance, difficulty, time needed. Create prioritized schedule with: daily tasks, time allocations, buffer periods, and stress management breaks.

prompts.title: Memory Technique Applicator
prompts.prompt: Information to memorize: [CONTENT]. Create: 1) Mnemonics, 2) Story-based memory palace, 3) Acronyms, 4) Visual associations, 5) Chunking strategies, 6) Spaced repetition schedule.

prompts.title: Test-Taking Strategy Builder
prompts.prompt: Test type: [FORMAT]. Subject: [SUBJECT]. Common challenges: [ISSUES]. Develop strategies for: time management, question approach, stress management, checking work, and handling difficult questions.

prompts.title: Research Source Evaluator
prompts.prompt: Source: [URL OR CITATION]. Evaluate for: 1) Author credibility, 2) Publication reliability, 3) Bias identification, 4) Currency and relevance, 5) Evidence quality, 6) Recommendation (use/skip).

prompts.title: Learning Style Optimizer
prompts.prompt: Subject struggling with: [SUBJECT]. Describe how you learn best: [LEARNING PREFERENCES]. Create a personalized study approach with: specific techniques, resources, activities, and practice methods.

prompts.title: Classroom Participation Enhancer
prompts.prompt: Class: [SUBJECT]. Current topic: [TOPIC]. Generate: 1) Insightful questions to ask, 2) Discussion contribution ideas, 3) Connection points to previous lessons, 4) Respectful challenge statements, 5) Clarification requests.

prompts.title: Peer Review Giver
prompts.prompt: Reviewing peer's work on [TOPIC]. Their draft: [SUMMARY]. Provide constructive feedback on: 1) Strengths, 2) Areas for improvement, 3) Specific suggestions, 4) Questions for clarification, 5) Encouragement.

prompts.title: Career Exploration for Students
prompts.prompt: My interests: [INTERESTS]. My strengths: [STRENGTHS]. Studying: [MAJOR]. Explore career paths with: job descriptions, required skills, typical progression, salary ranges in Pakistan, and action steps.

prompts.title: Note-Taking System Designer
prompts.prompt: Subject: [SUBJECT]. Learning style: [STYLE]. Create a note-taking system with: template structure, color coding, symbol key, review schedule, and digital/analog tool recommendations.

prompts.title: Online Research Navigator
prompts.prompt: Research question: [QUESTION]. Guide me through: 1) Search strategy with keywords, 2) Reliable database suggestions, 3) Source type priorities, 4) Information synthesis approach, 5) Citation organization.

prompts.title: Academic Vocabulary Builder
prompts.prompt: Field: [ACADEMIC FIELD]. Provide: 1) 20 essential terms with definitions, 2) Usage examples, 3) Related terms, 4) Practice sentences, 5) Memory techniques for each term.

prompts.title: Extra Credit Opportunity Creator
prompts.prompt: Class: [SUBJECT]. Struggling with: [TOPIC]. Propose extra credit project ideas that: demonstrate understanding, go beyond requirements, are feasible, and show genuine effort.

prompts.title: Parent-Teacher Conference Preparer
prompts.prompt: For [STUDENT] in [GRADE]. Prepare: 1) Key achievements to highlight, 2) Challenges to discuss, 3) Questions to ask teachers, 4) Goals to set, 5) Follow-up action plan.

prompts.title: Textbook Chapter Digester
prompts.prompt: Chapter: [CHAPTER TITLE] from [TEXTBOOK]. Create: 1) Chapter summary, 2) Key terms glossary, 3) Main concepts with examples, 4) Self-test questions, 5) Connections to previous chapters.

prompts.title: Discussion Board Responder
prompts.prompt: Discussion prompt: [PROMPT]. Original post: [POST]. Create a thoughtful response that: adds new perspective, references course material, asks engaging questions, and maintains respectful tone.

prompts.title: Internship Application Helper
prompts.prompt: Internship: [POSITION]. Requirements: [REQUIREMENTS]. My background: [BRIEF SUMMARY]. Create: 1) Tailored cover letter outline, 2) Resume bullet points, 3) Interview preparation, 4) Questions to ask, 5) Follow-up strategy.

prompts.title: Final Exam Consolidator
prompts.prompt: Course: [COURSE NAME]. All topics covered: [LIST TOPICS]. Create a comprehensive final exam study guide with: topic hierarchy, key concepts per topic, likely question types, and study priority ranking.

prompts.title: Academic Goal Setter
prompts.prompt: Current GPA: [GPA]. Target: [GOAL]. Timeline: [SEMESTER/YEAR]. Create an action plan with: specific grade goals per class, study hour targets, support resources needed, and progress checkpoints.

prompts.title: Classroom Technology Guide
prompts.prompt: Assignment requires: [TECHNOLOGY/SOFTWARE]. I'm unfamiliar with it. Provide: 1) Basic tutorial steps, 2) Tips for this specific assignment, 3) Common mistakes to avoid, 4) Where to get help, 5) Alternative tools.

prompts.title: Study Break Optimizer
prompts.prompt: Been studying [SUBJECT] for [HOURS]. Create a 15-minute break routine that: refreshes mentally, reduces physical strain, boosts energy, and helps retention. Include timing for each activity.

prompts.title: Assessment Reflection Guide
prompts.prompt: Just received grade on [ASSIGNMENT/TEST]. Grade: [GRADE]. Expected: [EXPECTED]. Facilitate reflection on: what went well, what didn't, root causes, improvement strategies, and next steps.

prompts.title: Reading List Manager
prompts.prompt: Course reading list: [LIST TITLES]. Time available: [WEEKS]. Create reading schedule with: daily page targets, priority ranking, note-taking approach, comprehension checks, and discussion prep.

prompts.title: Academic Integrity Checker
prompts.prompt: Working on [ASSIGNMENT TYPE]. Clarify the boundaries: 1) What collaboration is allowed, 2) How to properly cite, 3) Paraphrasing vs plagiarism, 4) AI tool usage policies, 5) When to ask professor.

categories.name: Creative Professionals
categories.description: Unleash your creativity with prompts for writers, designers, and artists

prompts.title: Story Concept Generator
prompts.prompt: Genre: [GENRE]. Themes: [THEMES]. Generate 5 unique story concepts with: protagonist description, central conflict, plot twist potential, setting details, and emotional arc.

prompts.title: Character Development Deep-Dive
prompts.prompt: Character name: [NAME]. Role: [ROLE IN STORY]. Create comprehensive profile: backstory, personality traits, fears and desires, character arc, unique quirks, speaking style, relationships, and a defining moment.

prompts.title: Writer's Block Breaker
prompts.prompt: Stuck at: [DESCRIBE SCENE/SITUATION]. Story so far: [BRIEF SUMMARY]. Generate 5 different directions to continue, each with: action sequence, dialogue starter, plot development, and potential consequences.

prompts.title: Brand Voice Creator
prompts.prompt: Brand: [BRAND NAME]. Industry: [INDUSTRY]. Target audience: [AUDIENCE]. Values: [VALUES]. Define brand voice with: tone characteristics, vocabulary guidelines, sentence structure, things to avoid, and 10 example phrases.

prompts.title: Social Media Content Calendar
prompts.prompt: Platform: [PLATFORM]. Niche: [NICHE]. Goals: [GOALS]. Create 30-day content calendar with: daily post ideas, content types, optimal posting times, hashtag strategies, and engagement tactics.

prompts.title: Visual Design Brief Generator
prompts.prompt: Project: [PROJECT NAME]. Purpose: [PURPOSE]. Target audience: [AUDIENCE]. Create design brief with: style direction, color palette with hex codes, typography suggestions, mood board descriptions, and deliverable specifications.

prompts.title: Headline Multiplier
prompts.prompt: Topic: [TOPIC]. Article focus: [MAIN POINT]. Generate 20 headlines in different styles: clickbait, SEO-optimized, emotional, curiosity-driven, list-based, question-based, controversial, and straightforward.

prompts.title: Portfolio Project Selector
prompts.prompt: My skills: [SKILLS]. Industry: [INDUSTRY]. Experience level: [LEVEL]. Suggest 5 portfolio projects that: showcase abilities, are achievable, impress clients, demonstrate range, and have clear outcomes.

prompts.title: Creative Brief Analyzer
prompts.prompt: Client brief: [PASTE BRIEF]. Analyze and clarify: 1) Core objectives, 2) Hidden expectations, 3) Potential challenges, 4) Questions to ask client, 5) Success metrics, 6) Recommended approach.

prompts.title: Video Script Outliner
prompts.prompt: Video topic: [TOPIC]. Length: [DURATION]. Platform: [YOUTUBE/INSTAGRAM/TIKTOK]. Create script outline with: hook (0-5s), value proposition, main points with timing, call-to-action, and visual suggestions.

prompts.title: Copywriting Formula Applicator
prompts.prompt: Product/service: [DESCRIPTION]. Target pain point: [PAIN POINT]. Apply these copywriting formulas: AIDA, PAS, FAB, 4Ps, and generate copy variations for each formula.

prompts.title: Creative Concept Brainstormer
prompts.prompt: Campaign for: [PRODUCT/SERVICE]. Audience: [AUDIENCE]. Constraint: [BUDGET/TIME/PLATFORM]. Generate 10 creative concepts with: big idea, execution details, why it works, and potential ROI.

prompts.title: Typography Pairing Guide
prompts.prompt: Project: [PROJECT TYPE]. Mood: [MOOD/FEELING]. Brand personality: [PERSONALITY]. Suggest 5 font pairings with: heading font, body font, rationale, usage guidelines, and free/paid alternatives.

prompts.title: Art Style Explorer
prompts.prompt: Project brief: [BRIEF]. Explore 5 distinct art styles with: style description, visual characteristics, color approach, famous examples, tools/techniques needed, and suitability rating for this project.

prompts.title: Dialogue Naturalization
prompts.prompt: Character: [CHARACTER]. Situation: [SITUATION]. Current dialogue: [DIALOGUE]. Rewrite to sound natural with: subtext, realistic interruptions, speech patterns, emotional undertones, and character voice consistency.

prompts.title: Newsletter Content Strategist
prompts.prompt: Newsletter theme: [THEME]. Frequency: [WEEKLY/MONTHLY]. Audience: [AUDIENCE]. Create content strategy with: section breakdown, content types, tone guidelines, recurring elements, and 10 edition ideas.

prompts.title: Logo Concept Developer
prompts.prompt: Company: [NAME]. Industry: [INDUSTRY]. Values: [VALUES]. Target impression: [IMPRESSION]. Generate 5 logo concepts with: design direction, symbolism, color psychology, typography approach, and versatility notes.

prompts.title: Plot Twist Generator
prompts.prompt: Story setup: [BRIEF PLOT SUMMARY]. Genre: [GENRE]. Generate 5 plot twists that: make sense in retrospect, subvert expectations, deepen character arcs, raise stakes, and satisfy emotionally.

prompts.title: Client Pitch Structure
prompts.prompt: Pitching: [SERVICE/PRODUCT]. Client: [CLIENT NAME]. Industry: [INDUSTRY]. Create pitch structure with: attention-grabbing opening, problem identification, solution presentation, proof points, pricing strategy, and closing.

prompts.title: Illustration Composition Guide
prompts.prompt: Subject: [SUBJECT]. Purpose: [PURPOSE]. Medium: [DIGITAL/TRADITIONAL]. Provide composition guidance: focal point, rule of thirds application, color balance, depth creation, visual hierarchy, and storytelling elements.

prompts.title: Blog Post Optimizer
prompts.prompt: Draft post: [TITLE/SUMMARY]. Target keyword: [KEYWORD]. Optimize for: 1) SEO (headings, keywords, meta), 2) Readability (sentence length, paragraphs), 3) Engagement (hooks, CTAs), 4) Shareability.

prompts.title: Creative Feedback Framework
prompts.prompt: Work to review: [DESCRIPTION]. Creator's goals: [GOALS]. Provide structured feedback: 1) What works well (specific), 2) What could improve (actionable), 3) Alternative approaches, 4) Encouraging comments.

prompts.title: Music Lyric Assistant
prompts.prompt: Song theme: [THEME]. Mood: [MOOD]. Genre: [GENRE]. Generate: 1) Hook/chorus ideas, 2) Verse concepts, 3) Rhyme schemes, 4) Metaphor suggestions, 5) Bridge development, 6) Title options.

prompts.title: UI/UX Flow Mapper
prompts.prompt: App feature: [FEATURE]. User goal: [GOAL]. Map user flow with: entry point, decision points, success path, error handling, exit points, and micro-interactions. Identify friction areas.

prompts.title: Photo Series Conceptualizer
prompts.prompt: Theme: [THEME]. Medium: [PHOTOGRAPHY TYPE]. Create photo series concept with: overarching narrative, 8-10 shot list with descriptions, styling notes, lighting approach, and cohesion strategy.

prompts.title: Podcast Episode Planner
prompts.prompt: Podcast about: [TOPIC]. Episode theme: [THEME]. Length: [DURATION]. Create episode outline with: cold open, intro, segment breakdown with timing, questions/talking points, and outro with CTA.

prompts.title: Freelance Rate Calculator
prompts.prompt: My skills: [SKILLS]. Experience: [YEARS]. Location: [CITY]. Project type: [TYPE]. Calculate fair rate based on: market research, skill value, overhead costs, desired income, and negotiation range.

prompts.title: Creative Project Timeline
prompts.prompt: Project: [PROJECT]. Deliverable: [DELIVERABLE]. Deadline: [DATE]. Create realistic timeline with: research phase, ideation, drafts/iterations, review periods, revision buffer, and final delivery.

prompts.title: Website Copywriter
prompts.prompt: Website for: [BUSINESS]. Page: [HOME/ABOUT/SERVICE]. Audience: [AUDIENCE]. Write copy with: compelling headline, value proposition, benefit statements, social proof integration, and strong CTA.

prompts.title: Color Palette Generator
prompts.prompt: Project: [PROJECT]. Brand personality: [PERSONALITY]. Industry: [INDUSTRY]. Cultural context: [CULTURE]. Generate 5 color palettes with: hex codes, color psychology reasoning, usage hierarchy, and accessibility notes.

prompts.title: Storyboard Creator
prompts.prompt: Scene description: [SCENE]. Purpose: [PURPOSE]. Create storyboard with: 8-12 frame descriptions, camera angles, movement notes, dialogue/sound, transitions, and emotional beats.

prompts.title: Content Repurposing Strategist
prompts.prompt: Original content: [DESCRIBE]. Platform: [PLATFORM]. Repurpose into: 1) Instagram carousel, 2) Twitter thread, 3) LinkedIn post, 4) Pinterest graphic, 5) Email snippet, 6) Short video script.

prompts.title: Artist Statement Writer
prompts.prompt: My work: [MEDIUM/STYLE]. Themes: [THEMES]. Influences: [INFLUENCES]. Write artist statement covering: creative philosophy, techniques, inspiration sources, recurring themes, and artistic goals. (200-300 words)

prompts.title: Packaging Design Brief
prompts.prompt: Product: [PRODUCT]. Target market: [MARKET]. Shelf placement: [RETAIL ENVIRONMENT]. Create packaging brief: functional requirements, design style, branding integration, information hierarchy, and sustainability considerations.

prompts.title: Scene Setting Enhancer
prompts.prompt: Scene location: [LOCATION]. Time period: [TIME]. Mood: [MOOD]. Enhance scene description using: sensory details (all 5 senses), atmospheric elements, character interaction with space, and symbolic details.

prompts.title: Animation Sequence Planner
prompts.prompt: Animation: [DESCRIPTION]. Duration: [SECONDS]. Style: [STYLE]. Plan sequence with: key frames, timing breakdown, easing/motion type, layer organization, and sound effect suggestions.

prompts.title: Exhibition Proposal Writer
prompts.prompt: Exhibition concept: [CONCEPT]. Venue: [VENUE]. Artwork: [DESCRIPTION]. Write proposal with: curatorial statement, exhibition narrative, spatial plan, audience engagement strategy, and budget outline.

prompts.title: Creative Ritual Designer
prompts.prompt: My creative challenges: [CHALLENGES]. Available time: [TIME]. Design a pre-work ritual with: environment setup, mindfulness component, inspiration gathering, warm-up exercises, and transition to deep work.

prompts.title: Conflict Escalation Mapper
prompts.prompt: Story conflict: [CONFLICT]. Characters: [CHARACTERS]. Map conflict escalation through: initial tension, complications, turning points, crisis moment, climax, and resolution. Include emotional stakes at each stage.

prompts.title: Mood Board Curator
prompts.prompt: Project: [PROJECT]. Desired feeling: [FEELING]. References: [ANY REFERENCES]. Curate mood board description with: imagery categories, color themes, texture notes, typography examples, and overall cohesion strategy.

prompts.title: Client Onboarding Questionnaire
prompts.prompt: Service: [SERVICE]. Create client questionnaire that uncovers: project goals, success metrics, brand personality, target audience insights, constraints, inspirations, and decision-making process.

prompts.title: Writing Style Matcher
prompts.prompt: Target style: [AUTHOR/PUBLICATION]. My content: [TOPIC]. Analyze target style for: sentence structure, vocabulary level, pacing, point of view, humor/tone, and provide rewriting guidelines with examples.

prompts.title: Creative Block Diagnosis
prompts.prompt: I'm stuck on: [PROJECT]. Feeling: [EMOTION]. Usually work best when: [CONDITIONS]. Diagnose likely block cause: perfectionism, unclear direction, skill gap, burnout, fear. Provide specific solutions for each.

prompts.title: Print Design Specifier
prompts.prompt: Print project: [PROJECT TYPE]. Size: [SIZE]. Quantity: [QUANTITY]. Specify print requirements: file format, resolution, color mode, bleed, fonts, paper stock recommendations, and pre-flight checklist.

prompts.title: Testimonial Transformer
prompts.prompt: Raw testimonial: [TESTIMONIAL]. Transform into compelling copy by: extracting key benefit, adding emotional resonance, improving structure, maintaining authenticity, and creating different length versions (tweet, paragraph, long-form).

prompts.title: Creative Collaboration Facilitator
prompts.prompt: Team size: [NUMBER]. Project: [PROJECT]. Roles: [ROLES]. Facilitate collaboration with: role clarity, communication protocols, feedback structure, decision-making process, conflict resolution, and celebration rituals.

prompts.title: Iconography System Designer
prompts.prompt: Product: [PRODUCT]. Number of icons needed: [NUMBER]. Design system guidelines: style (line/fill/outline), size, grid, stroke weight, corner radius, color usage, and semantic categories.

prompts.title: Creative Portfolio Reviewer
prompts.prompt: Portfolio pieces: [DESCRIBE]. Target clients: [CLIENTS]. Review for: project diversity, skill demonstration, case study strength, presentation quality, personal brand consistency, and missing elements.

prompts.title: Worldbuilding Framework
prompts.prompt: Story world: [BRIEF DESCRIPTION]. Genre: [GENRE]. Build world with: geography/setting, history, social structure, economy, technology level, cultural norms, magic/science rules, and how it affects plot.

categories.name: General Productivity
categories.description: Supercharge your productivity with these professional workflow prompts

prompts.title: Email Draft Optimizer
prompts.prompt: Email purpose: [PURPOSE]. Recipient: [ROLE]. Draft: [PASTE EMAIL]. Optimize for: clarity, tone appropriateness, action items, subject line, and provide 3 versions (formal, friendly, brief).

prompts.title: Meeting Agenda Designer
prompts.prompt: Meeting topic: [TOPIC]. Attendees: [ROLES]. Duration: [TIME]. Goals: [GOALS]. Create agenda with: pre-meeting prep, timing per item, decision points, discussion facilitation notes, and follow-up actions template.

prompts.title: Task Prioritization Matrix
prompts.prompt: My tasks: [LIST TASKS WITH CONTEXT]. Deadlines: [DATES]. Organize using Eisenhower Matrix (urgent/important) with: priority ranking, time estimates, dependencies, delegation opportunities, and execution order.

prompts.title: Decision-Making Framework
prompts.prompt: Decision: [DECISION]. Options: [OPTIONS]. Constraints: [CONSTRAINTS]. Apply framework: 1) Define success criteria, 2) Weighted pros/cons per option, 3) Risk analysis, 4) Long-term impact, 5) Recommendation with reasoning.

prompts.title: Project Kickoff Planner
prompts.prompt: Project: [NAME]. Goals: [GOALS]. Timeline: [DURATION]. Team: [SIZE]. Create kickoff plan with: objectives, deliverables, milestones, roles, communication plan, risks, success metrics, and first-week tasks.

prompts.title: Habit Formation System
prompts.prompt: Habit to build: [HABIT]. Current routine: [ROUTINE]. Obstacles: [OBSTACLES]. Design system with: trigger, routine, reward, tracking method, accountability, micro-habits, and 30-day progressive plan.

prompts.title: Difficult Conversation Preparer
prompts.prompt: Conversation about: [TOPIC]. With: [PERSON/ROLE]. Concern: [CONCERN]. Prepare with: conversation opener, key points to cover, empathy statements, boundaries, desired outcome, and response preparation.

prompts.title: Weekly Review Template
prompts.prompt: Reflect on the week: 1) Wins and accomplishments, 2) Challenges faced, 3) Lessons learned, 4) Incomplete items, 5) Energy/mood patterns, 6) Next week priorities, 7) One thing to improve.

prompts.title: Process Documentation Writer
prompts.prompt: Process: [PROCESS NAME]. Users: [WHO FOLLOWS IT]. Document with: purpose, prerequisites, step-by-step instructions, decision points, troubleshooting, examples, and version/update date.

prompts.title: Focus Session Structurer
prompts.prompt: Work to do: [TASK]. Available time: [DURATION]. Distractions: [DISTRACTIONS]. Structure session with: preparation (5min), deep work blocks, strategic breaks, environment setup, distraction protocol, and wind-down.

prompts.title: Goal Setting Framework
prompts.prompt: Big goal: [GOAL]. Timeframe: [TIMEFRAME]. Make it SMART: Specific (clarify), Measurable (metrics), Achievable (reality check), Relevant (why it matters), Time-bound (milestones). Include action steps.

prompts.title: Problem-Solving Protocol
prompts.prompt: Problem: [PROBLEM]. Impact: [IMPACT]. Apply protocol: 1) Root cause analysis (5 Whys), 2) Brainstorm solutions, 3) Evaluate options, 4) Test plan, 5) Implementation steps, 6) Success measurement.

prompts.title: Feedback Request Crafter
prompts.prompt: Work: [WORK TYPE]. From: [PERSON]. Need feedback on: [SPECIFIC AREAS]. Craft request that: provides context, asks specific questions, sets deadline, explains how you'll use feedback, and shows appreciation.

prompts.title: Energy Management Analyzer
prompts.prompt: Typical day: [DESCRIBE SCHEDULE]. Energy patterns: [WHEN HIGH/LOW]. Tasks: [LIST]. Optimize schedule by: matching task difficulty to energy, protecting peak hours, strategic breaks, energy-boosting activities.

prompts.title: Delegation Determiner
prompts.prompt: My tasks: [LIST]. Team capacity: [DESCRIBE]. For each task, analyze: required skill level, time needed, development opportunity, my unique value-add. Recommend what to delegate, to whom, and how.

prompts.title: Status Report Generator
prompts.prompt: Project: [PROJECT]. Reporting to: [AUDIENCE]. Period: [TIMEFRAME]. Generate report with: progress summary, completed milestones, upcoming tasks, blockers/risks, support needed, and key metrics.

prompts.title: Morning Routine Optimizer
prompts.prompt: Current routine: [DESCRIBE]. Goals: [GOALS]. Time available: [TIME]. Design optimized routine with: wake-up ritual, prioritized activities, timing, flexibility buffer, and evening prep that sets up success.

prompts.title: Boundary Setting Guide
prompts.prompt: Boundary needed: [DESCRIBE SITUATION]. Relationship: [CONTEXT]. Create boundary statement that: is clear and specific, uses 'I' language, explains impact, offers alternative, and maintains respect.

prompts.title: Knowledge Management System
prompts.prompt: Information I collect: [TYPES]. Current challenge: [CHALLENGE]. Design system with: capture method, organization structure, retrieval strategy, review cadence, and tool recommendations.

prompts.title: Burnout Prevention Plan
prompts.prompt: Current workload: [DESCRIBE]. Stress signs: [SYMPTOMS]. Create prevention plan with: workload boundaries, energy renewal activities, support system, warning signs monitoring, and intervention steps.

prompts.title: Negotiation Preparer
prompts.prompt: Negotiating: [WHAT]. With: [WHO]. My position: [POSITION]. Their likely position: [POSITION]. Prepare with: BATNA, opening offer, walk-away point, value creation opportunities, and tactics.

prompts.title: Presentation Structure Builder
prompts.prompt: Presentation on: [TOPIC]. Audience: [AUDIENCE]. Time: [DURATION]. Goal: [GOAL]. Build structure: opening hook, key messages (max 3), supporting evidence, stories/examples, call-to-action, Q&A prep.

prompts.title: Time Audit Analyzer
prompts.prompt: My time last week: [ROUGH BREAKDOWN]. Goals: [GOALS]. Analyze alignment between time spent and priorities. Identify: time wasters, misallocations, missing activities, efficiency opportunities, ideal reallocation.

prompts.title: Annual Review Framework
prompts.prompt: Year in review. Provide: biggest accomplishments, challenges overcome, skills gained, relationships strengthened, opportunities missed, lessons learned, themes, and priorities for next year.

prompts.title: Meeting Notes Structurer
prompts.prompt: Meeting: [TOPIC]. Attendees: [ATTENDEES]. Structure notes with: key decisions, action items (who, what, when), open questions, important discussion points, parking lot items, and next meeting agenda.

prompts.title: Procrastination Pattern Analyzer
prompts.prompt: I procrastinate on: [TASKS]. When: [SITUATIONS]. Create analysis: 1) Identify procrastination type, 2) Root causes, 3) Triggers, 4) Costs of delay, 5) Customized anti-procrastination strategies.

prompts.title: Career Development Planner
prompts.prompt: Current role: [ROLE]. Career goal: [GOAL]. Timeline: [TIMELINE]. Create development plan with: skill gaps, learning resources, experience needed, networking strategy, milestones, and quarterly check-ins.

prompts.title: Communication Style Adapter
prompts.prompt: My communication style: [STYLE]. Communicating with: [PERSON'S STYLE]. About: [TOPIC]. Adapt approach by: adjusting pace, detail level, formality, channel, and conflict style for effective communication.

prompts.title: Context Switching Minimizer
prompts.prompt: My work requires: [LIST DIFFERENT TYPES OF WORK]. Current approach: [APPROACH]. Design schedule that: batches similar work, creates transition rituals, protects focus time, and minimizes switching costs.

prompts.title: Retrospective Facilitator
prompts.prompt: Project/Sprint: [NAME]. Team: [SIZE]. Facilitate retrospective covering: What went well, What didn't, Why (root cause), Action items, Appreciation, and one surprising insight.

prompts.title: Email Management System
prompts.prompt: Email volume: [VOLUME]. Current issues: [ISSUES]. Design system with: inbox zero strategy, folder structure, processing rules, response templates, unsubscribe plan, and checking schedule.

prompts.title: Stress Response Plan
prompts.prompt: Common stressors: [STRESSORS]. Current coping: [METHODS]. Create response plan with: early warning signs, immediate calming techniques, problem-solving approach, support to request, and recovery activities.

prompts.title: Remote Work Optimizer
prompts.prompt: Remote work challenges: [CHALLENGES]. Setup: [CURRENT SETUP]. Optimize with: workspace design, schedule structure, communication norms, boundary setting, social connection, and productivity hacks.

prompts.title: Learning Plan Creator
prompts.prompt: Want to learn: [SKILL/TOPIC]. Purpose: [PURPOSE]. Time available: [TIME]. Current level: [LEVEL]. Create learning plan: resources, practice activities, milestones, application opportunities, assessment.

prompts.title: Conflict Resolution Script
prompts.prompt: Conflict about: [ISSUE]. Parties: [PARTIES]. My role: [ROLE]. Create resolution script using: active listening prompts, neutrality language, problem reframing, solution generation, and agreement documentation.

prompts.title: Personal Brand Definer
prompts.prompt: My expertise: [EXPERTISE]. Values: [VALUES]. Audience: [AUDIENCE]. Define personal brand with: unique value proposition, key messages, content themes, visual identity, and consistency guidelines.

prompts.title: Workflow Automation Identifier
prompts.prompt: My repetitive tasks: [LIST]. Tools available: [TOOLS]. Identify automation opportunities with: task breakdown, automation potential (high/medium/low), tool recommendations, setup effort, and time savings.

prompts.title: Strategic Planning Framework
prompts.prompt: Planning for: [SCOPE]. Current state: [STATE]. Vision: [VISION]. Apply framework: SWOT analysis, strategic priorities, objectives (OKRs), initiatives, resource allocation, risks, and quarterly milestones.

prompts.title: Accountability System Designer
prompts.prompt: Goal: [GOAL]. Past accountability issues: [ISSUES]. Design system with: commitment device, progress tracking, check-in schedule, consequences (positive/negative), support structure, and pivot protocol.

prompts.title: Interruption Management Protocol
prompts.prompt: Common interruptions: [TYPES]. Impact: [IMPACT]. Create protocol: priority assessment system, deflection scripts, batching strategy, urgent criteria, and cultural change approach for team.

prompts.title: Document Summary Generator
prompts.prompt: Document: [TYPE/PURPOSE]. Length: [LENGTH]. Create tiered summaries: 1-sentence executive summary, 1-paragraph overview, 5-bullet key points, and full summary with sections. Highlight actionable items.

prompts.title: Failure Analysis Framework
prompts.prompt: What failed: [SITUATION]. Impact: [IMPACT]. Analyze with: timeline reconstruction, decision points, assumptions that broke, alternative actions, lessons learned, changes to implement, and moving forward plan.

prompts.title: Networking Strategy Builder
prompts.prompt: Networking goal: [GOAL]. Current network: [DESCRIBE]. Build strategy with: target connections, value you offer, outreach approach, conversation topics, follow-up system, and relationship maintenance.

prompts.title: Decision Log Creator
prompts.prompt: Decision: [DECISION]. Context: [CONTEXT]. Document: reasoning, alternatives considered, data used, stakeholders involved, expected outcomes, review date, and lessons learned (update later).

prompts.title: Change Management Guide
prompts.prompt: Change implementing: [CHANGE]. Affected people: [PEOPLE]. Create guide: change rationale, stakeholder concerns, communication plan, training needs, resistance management, and success indicators.

prompts.title: Personal Operating Manual
prompts.prompt: Create my personal manual covering: how I work best, communication preferences, feedback style, stress signs, what energizes/drains me, pet peeves, how to support me, and how I support others.

prompts.title: Critique Receiver's Guide
prompts.prompt: Receiving feedback on: [WORK]. From: [PERSON]. Prepare to: listen without defending, ask clarifying questions, separate emotion from content, identify actionable items, express gratitude, and decide what to apply.

prompts.title: Side Project Launcher
prompts.prompt: Side project idea: [IDEA]. Time available: [HOURS/WEEK]. Resources: [RESOURCES]. Create launch plan: MVP definition, weekly milestones, skill gaps to fill, first 10 users strategy, and sustainability plan.

prompts.title: Mental Model Applier
prompts.prompt: Situation: [SITUATION]. Apply useful mental models: First Principles, Inversion, Second-Order Thinking, Opportunity Cost, and Margin of Safety. Provide insights from each model's perspective.

prompts.title: The Clarity Finder
prompts.prompt: I'm confused about: [SITUATION]. Help me gain clarity by: 1) Identifying what I actually know vs assume, 2) Clarifying questions to ask, 3) Defining what 'good' looks like, 4) Removing what doesn't matter, 5) Next single step.

prompts.title: The Analogy Generator
prompts.prompt: Concept to explain: [CONCEPT]. Audience: [AUDIENCE]. Create 3 analogies that: map key features, use familiar references, maintain accuracy, reveal new insights, and stick in memory.

prompts.title: The Alternative Seeker
prompts.prompt: Current approach: [APPROACH]. Constraints: [CONSTRAINTS]. Generate 5 wildly different alternative approaches that: solve the same problem, challenge assumptions, vary in resource needs, and range from conservative to radical.

prompts.title: The Bias Checker
prompts.prompt: My belief: [BELIEF]. My reasoning: [REASONING]. Check for biases: confirmation bias, recency bias, availability bias, sunk cost fallacy. Provide counter-evidence and steel-man the opposing view.

prompts.title: The Template Creator
prompts.prompt: Recurring task: [TASK]. Create reusable template with: step-by-step checklist, decision points with criteria, common variations, quality checks, time estimates, and customization instructions.

prompts.title: The Momentum Builder
prompts.prompt: Feeling stuck on: [PROJECT]. Create momentum plan: 1) Smallest possible first step (5min), 2) Quick win identification, 3) Progress visibility system, 4) Accountability trigger, 5) Celebration ritual.

prompts.title: The Question Generator
prompts.prompt: Topic: [TOPIC]. Generate 20 thought-provoking questions across: clarifying questions, exploratory questions, challenging questions, connection questions, and application questions.

prompts.title: The Reframe Machine
prompts.prompt: Problem: [PROBLEM]. Reframe from 5 perspectives: as an opportunity, as feedback, as a learning experience, from future-self view, from outsider's view. For each, suggest new action.

prompts.title: The Success Pattern Identifier
prompts.prompt: My past success: [DESCRIBE SUCCESS]. Analyze: 1) Key factors that contributed, 2) My unique strengths leveraged, 3) Favorable conditions, 4) Repeatable patterns, 5) How to apply to [CURRENT SITUATION].

prompts.title: The Integration Prompt
prompts.prompt: Learned: [NEW LEARNING]. Current knowledge: [EXISTING KNOWLEDGE]. Integrate by: connecting to what I know, identifying contradictions, generating examples, creating practice opportunities, teaching someone.

usage_guide.how_to_use: Replace text in [BRACKETS] with your specific information. The more context you provide, the better the results.
customization_tips: Add specific details to make outputs more relevant
Combine multiple prompts for complex tasks
Adjust formality and tone based on your needs
Save your customized versions for repeated use
best_practices: Use these as starting points, not final products
